name: Avocado Story
description:
Hi! Thank you for checking this page!

This is an Avocado Story, a game created for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2023".

I am new in game development and this is the first game I created by myself,  for that reason, in this  jam I just wanted to explore and learn more about the Godot Engine, game development and test myself to see if I was capable of creating something without following tutorials. 

You will see that the game is pretty simple, I just wanted to learn how to use tilesets, animations, music, create pixel art and code. 

Thank you and feel free to provide any feedback.

----- Credits -----

- Art

Player art and animations were created by me. 

The Tileset and enviromental objects were created by Game Endeavor.  It can  be accessed in the following link: https://game-endeavor.itch.io/

The house was created by ozanoyunbozan. It can be accessed in the following link: https://ozanoyunbozan.itch.io/pixel-art-house-and-interior

The bug sprite and animations were created by Elthen's Pixel Art Shop. It can  be accessed in the following link:  https://elthen.itch.io/

The butterfly sprite and animation was created by Yvodlyn Paul. It can  be accessed in the following link:  https://yvodlynpaul.itch.io/tiny-butterfly-character

- Music

Music of victory and main menu was created by Matthew Pablo and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link:  https://opengameart.org/content/lively-meadow-victory-fanfare-and-song

Main game music was created by syncopika and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link: https://opengameart.org/content/forest

Step Sound was created by Blender Foundation (submitted by Lamoot). and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link:

https://opengameart.org/content/grass-foot-step-sounds-yo-frankie

Water music was created by poinl and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link: https://opengameart.org/content/elka

Growing sound effect was created by qubodup and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link: https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/442943/

Game over music was created by Baltiyar13 and it was not modified.  It can be accessed in the following link: 

https://freesound.org/people/Baltiyar13/sounds/507203/
